title: Buffalo-Style Chicken Wings
directions: Heat 3-inches of oil in a large saucepan until a deep-fry thermometer reaches 375°F|190°C.
Place the hot sauce, butter, and cajun seasoning in a large bowl and set aside.

Add the chicken wings to the oil and cook until golden and cooked through, a8 to 10 minutes. Using a slotted spoon, transfer the wings to the bowl of hot sauce and toss to coat. Serve with ranch dressing.
